pullRequest.title: New module for virtual attribute adDisplayName:o365mu
pullRequest.bodyText:
module will count display name by predefined rules
there is also simple test for module

nodes.bodyText: This is just a performance-related question, but wouldn't it be better to check the nullity of the cispr right away? This way, if the cispr is null, the other attribute is read and not used at all.
We probably don't want wildcard imports.
It would be nice to have the when and .then calls on separate lines, so it is easier to distinguish between those two parts.
